titleInfo.title: Big Fisherman and Ben Hur at the Donelson Theatre

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing The Big Fisherman starring Howard Keel and Susan Kohner at the Donelson Theatre for four days starting March 12, and Ben Hur starring Charlton Heston and Haya Harareet at the Donelson Theatre beginning March 16.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
